movie.title: War Machine
movie.plot: A rock star general bent on winning the “impossible” war in Afghanistan takes us inside the complex machinery of modern war. Inspired by the true story of General Stanley McChrystal.

events.title: the General's report is leaked to the public
the Rolling Stone article "The Runaway General" is published
